settings.helpText: This is the name of the piece of content for identification within Contentful- use sensible names e.g. Homepage latest news.

This field can be used to dynamically retrieve content to list based on the query criteria. The search query is a JSON object; e.g. {"content_type":"article"} will retrieve all articles.  For search parameters see; https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-delivery-api/#/reference/search-parameters/query-entries
Manually select what content you would like to appear in this list.  This is an alternative to using a query
